ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (regular or 98% Fat Free)
3/4 cup uncooked regular long-grain white rice
n: Campbell'sÂ® Cheesy Chicken and Rice Casserole
des: "So many favorite flavors and ingredients--chicken, Cheddar cheese, and vegetables--are in this one easy casserole."
ins:
Stir the soup, water, rice, vegetables and onion powder in a 12 x 8 inch shallow baking dish.
Top with chicken. Season chicken as desired. Cover.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 45 minutes or until done. Top with cheese.
